wikipedia_page.main: Harry Parker was an English footballer who made 54 appearances in the Football League playing for Glossop and Lincoln City. He played non-league football in the Leicestershire area, for Castle Donington and Midland League club Whitwick White Cross. He played as an outside left or inside left.

response: *Harry Parker (baseball) (1947–2012), pitcher in Major League Baseball
*Harry Parker, 6th Baronet (1735–1812), secretary of the Board of Longitude
